title: GAMEPLAY: Union Jack Fidd
body: I do not know how to screenshot in league. Anywhosle, I own Union Jack Fiddlesticks and the animation stops during his dance and he freezes, he will get ghost when he stops moving for a minute. Whenever you click down on the map and he finally gets there, he stops all animations and looks frozen in time. Also when you recall the animations stop whenever you get to the fountain and he just stands there, MENACINGLY. (Really though, it's quite creepy.){{champion:9}}

replies.body:
Yep^^  New passive~ He was tweaked during the Mid Year Mage Update to do this.
It's super fun right?
As others have said, this is his passive, and not something specific to this skin. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fMJ9LAoA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-19T20:20:37.384+0000)
>
> As others have said, this is his passive, and not something specific to this skin. ^-^

Yeah, but that's all fine and dandy but the other things I said are still happening. Where he doesn't have animations at all and is just frozen and his dance the like second time around it freezes in place.

This was added in Patch 6.10 - which was the patch straight after the Mid-Year Mage Update.

After 5 seconds of not moving, Fiddlesticks will become a scarecrow.. It's not directly tied to his passive but it was a deliberate move to have his animations freeze like that.
Well aside from ghost that the rest is still happening.

Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.

Its on the champion
